CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Fosterborough Stars?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Fosterborough Stars is arc {South Stars}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Fosterborough Stars?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Fosterborough Stars is arc {Cherylberg Sharks}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {New Chiefs} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Cherylberg Sharks} has the largest input flow.

VE.Q: What is the flow value from South Stars to Fosterborough Stars in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Cherylberg Sharks and Fosterborough Stars in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Cherylberg Sharks and Fosterborough Stars is {227}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between New Chiefs and South Stars in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between New Chiefs and South Stars is {159}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from South Stars?
SC.A: The total flow output from South Stars is {488}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by South Stars?
SC.A: The total flow input by South Stars is {436}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 670? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {1583} from {New Chiefs} to {Cherylberg Sharks}, a flow of {820} from {Cherylberg Sharks} to {New Chiefs}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 186? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {182} from {South Stars} to {New Chiefs}, a flow of {159} from {New Chiefs} to {South Stars}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 252 and 347? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {306} from {South Stars} to {Fosterborough Stars}, a flow of {277} from {Fosterborough Stars} to {South Stars}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Fosterborough Stars to New Chiefs or from Fosterborough Stars to Cherylberg Sharks?
NC.A: The flow from {Fosterborough Stars} to {New Chiefs} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from New Chiefs to Fosterborough Stars, from South Stars to New Chiefs, or from New Chiefs to South Stars?
NC.A: The flow from {New Chiefs} to {Fosterborough Stars} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {New Chiefs}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Cherylberg Sharks} and {New Chiefs}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Fosterborough Stars, Arc New Chiefs, Arc Cherylberg Sharks, Arc South Stars}.
